TEXT.TITLE: TEXAS AIR <TEX> UNIT TO EXPAND SERVICE
TEXT.BODY: Texas Air Corp's Continental Airlines said it will begin service in April to Bakersfield, Calif., and Eugene and Medford, Ore., from its hub at Denver. From Denver, Continental will fly a daily nonstop and a one-stop flight to each of the three cities, the company said. Service to the Oregon cities will start April 5 and to Bakersfield, April 22. Reuter
